name: Dragon Farm - Airworld
description:
Welcome to the Dragon farm - Airworld a game that takes place in the dragons world. This epic rpg farm like game is full of magic, and the one of the most unique fusion between a farming and rpg game on Android. If you love magic and a game that takes place in a dragons world you should play this fun and FREE dragon farm game. You have to work hard to solve the many quests, these tasks start out really simple basic collecting stuff and farming tasks. Make a workbench and start crafting your items which you can later in the game. take good care of the dragon egg and you will get the chance to raise, feed and take care of your own little dragon in this dragons world game.

Fly your own dragon to other floating islands and start farming there as well. Start taming the adorable creatures like sheeps as well in this farming and dragons world rpg game. So you can uncover hidden magic treasures in this fun dragon game, these items you can find in the most unusual areas in this magic dragon kingdom. Start repairing your broken items, so you can find all the parts of the magical Sun Amulet and all the treasures of the ancient dragon that was the most beautiful dragon of them all. Jump on top of the back of the dragon fly away to the next island and continue your magical quest.

Dragon farm - Air world game features:

• Loads of different task to clear, get your character to the highest level
• Decorate your own magic floating island
• take care of your own dragon in this dragon world fantasy game
• Jump on top of the back of the dragon fly away to the next island
• Super simple controls, touch and play this dragon game
• Super smooth gameplay tested on different mobile devices
• Loads of different items to craft
• take care of you island and farm your stuff in time

We add extra challenging quests, achievements, artifacts or items with each update. You can decorate your magic islands with the cutest objects and share your beautiful world with your friends on Facebook.

Stunning graphics, a fairy soundtrack, an addictive gameplay along the way help you enjoy the fantastic journey! Attention: no internet connection is required!

PLEASE NOTE! Dragon farm - Airworld is completely free to play, but some game items can also be purchased for real money also ads may appear. When you make an in game purchases the ads disappear
